attributes.title: If you download this app you’re terrible
attributes.review: This is and the president and liars and worthless. I really suggest deleting this and voting for someone else besides Kanye. I don’t care if my family supports him, they only support him for the ignorant reason ever. We’re Latin so I know we’re not respected in trumps eyes, so if I do the respect I deserve then I will never respect him. He’s a filthy piece of crap and a manipulative bastard. I recommend never voting a racist ever, and if you still do you’re racist and don’t deserve to have other cultures that is the foundation of this country.

attributes.title: DO NIT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Ever since I’ve had this app downloaded weird things have been happening to my phone. As in glitching and even getting calls from unknown number after doing certain things on my phone. It’s almost like there’s a hacker in my phone watching my every move. Even when I’m typing. I’ll be typing a word and it automatically auto corrects to the word “Trump” when I’m not even typing a word that uses any of the letters in “Trump”. So I very much do not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: Literal Trash 💩💩💩
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and moments later my house caught on fire 🔥 and my cat 🐈 died 💀💀 this is proof that mr cheeto puff is daemon spawn 👹👹👹 as well as his followers and this app 🤢 to support this claim just watch the news 📰 and see all the horrid stuff trump 🍊has done to America 🇱🇷 and all of the problems  🌫 that have occurred during his time as president 😩 I am appalled and horrified 😓 also he has little 🍆 energy and therefore is useless and sad 😔 as for appearances... trump closely resembles a clown 🤡 with orange face makeup 💄I’m certain that rats 🐀 look adorable in comparison to him 🙉

attributes.title: Horrible app do not recommend
attributes.review: Got the app so I could see all the great news about Trump but it would not let me make an account I tried multiple time with multiple different emails and it just wouldn’t let me get in. I thought maybe to delete and redownload it when I opened the app again it got frozen on the loading screen. Reopened the app a lot and still had the same problem of being stuck on the loading screen. Do not download this app it is horrible.

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I could keep up with the news of our amazing President but every time I’d open the app they would want me to pay upwards of 50 dollars!! The fact that they would expect me to pay any money at all to them is hilarious. I’m not the best with technology but the layout is so confusing. And the information they gave I quickly debunked with a quick google search! It’s an absolute no from me but maybe others will have a different experience.

attributes.title: very bad
attributes.review: No❤️ this app was very laggy and didn’t work at all. it took up a lot of my storage for no reason since it didn’t even work and I had to keep pressing the buttons for it to load and work. I didn’t want trump for president but if this is what he provides I don’t want him even more. I am very mad that this happened. This was very immature for him to make since it doesn’t work. Also one question was this before or after his nudes were leaked? Anyways Stan Bernie Sanders and AOC for clear skin❤️ TRUMP 2020💕😻 in a GRAVE🧚🏻‍♀️🥵✨😌💙

attributes.title: This app gave me aids 🤬👿
attributes.review:
Since our president is a idiot, I surely thought the A. I. would be smarter, but I was proven wrong. I downloaded the app and while I was sleeping it transmitted radio waves to my brain, tricking my brain and making my body think I have aids. My boyfriend is so mad we can’t even have sex. I love him and wouldn’t dare to give him this awful curse. He has now started sleeping with the dog instead of me because he is too tempted to have sex with me. I hate you trump I never had a problem with you until this. 😥 

TRUMP 2020 🥰🌿 BUT ON A GRAVE STONE 🧚🏽‍♀️🌸

attributes.title: wackkkk✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: so, i wanted to support our beloved president bunker boy🥰 which is the reason i downloaded the app, as soon as the app downloaded a bomb came down on my house & helen keller kicked down my door & threw water on me while screaming “WATER!” 👁👄👁 now if that wasn’t heartbreaking enough next thing i know, the app started taking over my phone & then mr cheeto puff himself was standing in front of me, then he winked @ me, & left✨ i was crying cs of what i had saw, nobody should have to witness this monstrosity😞 this app is great❤️💞✨🧚🏽‍♀️🥰 if uu want to burn yours eyes out & throw up✨💕🥺🧚🏽‍♀️😌

attributes.title: Absurd!!!
attributes.review: I am all for Trump 2020 but this app is just outwardly glitchy! I opened that app and all of a sudden a fat man in a bunny suit flooded my screen!! I tried to click away but every time I touched the screen he licked my finger. I was disgusted and threw up multiple times. This app has given me a stomach Virus and I am at a loss! How can I support my amazingly, handsome, orange president when this app is giving me cancer!? I mean a stomach virus!? Forgive my my king, my god, my savior President Trump, but I cannot take this app any longer. My stomach simply cannot take it.

attributes.title: Just my honest opinion 🥰
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app to show my  support to trumpie ☺️then I used it as it was the worst thing ever!! DO NOT GET THIS APP. First it was way to political and second it broke when I got it. I opened the app and there was a photo of a pumpkin and I was really confused like what does this app have to do with pumpkins. Third it asked me for my personal information and I was appalled like why would I want to give my personal information to an app with a pumpkin photo on it. WORST APP EVER DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL.🧚🏽‍♀️🌸❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🧚🏽‍♀️🧜🏾‍♀️🩰🥰👁👄👁🧚🏽‍♀️🧜🏾‍♀️😂🏳️‍🌈💜
